name: Outline
description: Represents a container for Paragraph objects.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the Outline object.

properties.name: pageContent
properties.description: Gets the PageContent object that contains the Outline. This object defines the position of the Outline on the page.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: Gets the collection of Paragraph objects in the Outline.

methods.name: append
methods.description: Adds the specified HTML to the bottom of the Outline.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: The HTML string to append. See [supported HTML](../../docs/onenote/onenote-add-ins-page-content.md#supported-html) for the OneNote add-ins JavaScript API.

methods.name: prepend
methods.description: Adds the specified HTML to the top of the Outline.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: The HTML string to prepend. See [supported HTML](../../docs/onenote/onenote-add-ins-page-content.md#supported-html) for the OneNote add-ins JavaScript API.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects the Outline and bring it to the view.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
